Pelvic surgery ( suburethral sling , pelvic floor repair ) within past 6 month Intravesical urethral sphincter Botulinum Toxin Type A injection within past 12 month Any neuromodulation therapy overactive bladder within past 3 month Failure respond previous neuromodulation therapy overactive bladder Leading edge vaginal prolapse beyond hymenel ring .
